Uses of Package
com.freedomotic.nlp

  • Packages that use com.freedomotic.nlp 
    Package Description
    com.freedomotic.api  
    com.freedomotic.app  
    com.freedomotic.nlp  
  • Classes in com.freedomotic.nlp used by com.freedomotic.api 
    Class and Description
    NlpCommand
    Computes Commands similarity ranking starting from free-text strings using NLP techniques
  • Classes in com.freedomotic.nlp used by com.freedomotic.app 
    Class and Description
    CommandsNlpService
    Listen for free-form (natural language) text commands on channel "app.commands.interpreter.nlp" and using NLP tools execute the most similar command that the framework has in memory.
  • Classes in com.freedomotic.nlp used by com.freedomotic.nlp 
    Class and Description
    Nlp
    Takes in input some text, analyzes it to compute a similarity value related to a set of predefined object avaliable to the system (eg: automation commands)
    Nlp.Rank 
    NlpCommand
    Computes Commands similarity ranking starting from free-text strings using NLP techniques
